definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫療系統的弊病絕不僅僅侷限於美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Rows of winter wheat wind their way to the Colorado horizon.
sentences.chinese: 美國科羅拉多州，成行成排的冬小麥綿亙不絕。

sentences.english: SHAKIR:Nay! if he desist not, We would certainly smite his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 絕不然，如果他不停止，我一定要抓住他的額髮。

sentences.english: He is second to none in physics.
sentences.chinese: 他在物理學方面絕不亞於任何人。

sentences.english: Fighting fire with fire without reconciliation and healing will never solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 以火攻火，不能和解和癒合，絕難解決問題。

sentences.english: A bridge on the Atlantic Road in Norway.
sentences.chinese: 絕路橋坐落於挪威的大西洋之路。

sentences.english: Above all, there is much more to his success than stock-picking alone.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，他的成功絕不僅僅限於選股。

sentences.english: In between, there is a trade thoroughfare, camels and incessant.
sentences.chinese: 在兩地之間，有一條通商大道，駱駝隊來往不絕。

sentences.english: Beautiful composition, excellent scenery, amazing play of colors.
sentences.chinese: 優雅的姿勢，絕美的風景，迷人的色彩組合。

sentences.english: A Blue Box is not just a pushke into which coins are put.
sentences.chinese: 一個募捐箱絕不僅僅是一個用來投放硬幣的箱子。

sentences.english: But I don't believe he ever laid a finger on them.
sentences.chinese: 但我相信傑克遜絕沒有碰過他們。

sentences.english: Water flowed from upstream, freely and unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 上游江水不絕流來，永無止息。

sentences.english: My window frames a thrilling snowy landscape.
sentences.chinese: 我的窗戶框住了一幅絕美的雪景。

sentences.english: Mr Williams refused his friend's advice and flounced out of the office.
sentences.chinese: 絕接受他朋友的勸告，暴跳如雷地離開了辦公室。

sentences.english: The guards are not just for show, however.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這些衛兵絕不僅僅是裝裝樣子而已。

sentences.english: During talking, suddenly a flock of crows flied across the low sky with sounds of their chirp ceaselessly.
sentences.chinese: 說話間，忽有一批烏鴉在低空飛過，叫聲不絕。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
